divs: Sighting Details "Was atplace of employment working oputside of plant when a thunder storm arised.Waited until storm was over and sun came out. Went outside to work and a darkobject caught my eye. I thought object was a ballon at first. It appeared torise straight up and then take a westerly (?)direction. As I watched the UFO Istarted feeling as if I was being watched. I had heard that UFOs can makecontact with ESP so I focused my thoughts and at that time the object tilted toreveal the hat shape. My thoughts were that if it was a UFO to let me know insome way. When UFO was overhead I went back into plant and out the east side ofbuilding to continue watching but could not spot it after that. The UFO movedslowly and very smoothly.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Forest Park
This sighting has never been favorited.
